description.translate: The only thing that sets you apart	from them is your ancestry...

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Anteterän\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7La seule chose qui te différencie\"}","{\"text\":\"§7d'eux, est ton ascendance...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The only thing that sets you apart\"}","{\"text\":\"§7from them is your ancestry...\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HER§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7SPD§c-2\"}"]}}
